pages.text: Requirements: $(li)16 Non-Wooden Slabs $(li)16 Dead Sands $(li)8 Non-Empty Flower Pots
An example of how the ritual can be placed.
The Dead Sand holds a lot of Necroturgic Energies. By constructing Graves with them, you found a way to gather up more Necroturgic Energies to use for Rituals.
